TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListView/ListViewItemCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ListView.ListViewItemCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示位於 控制項中或指派給 的項目集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of items in a control or assigned to a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A存放區中顯示的項目控制或指派給。A stores the items displayed in a control or assigned to a . 有兩個定義內的其他集合類別可讓您判斷哪些項目內，已選取控制項。There are two other collections defined within the class that enable you to determine what items are selected within a control. 類別會提供屬性和方法來判斷哪些項目中選取控制項，而類別可讓您判斷哪些索引內的控制項選取此項目。The class provides properties and methods for determining what items are selected in a control, while the class enables you to determine what indexes within the of a control are selected. 除了選取集合類別，也有兩個類別，可讓您判斷哪些項目會檢查 (當屬性控制設為 `true`) 在此集合中。In addition to selection collection classes, there are also two classes that enable you to determine what items are checked (when the property of the control is set to `true`) within this collection. 有數種方式將項目新增至集合。There are a number of ways to add items to the collection. 方法會將單一項目加入至集合。The method adds a single item to the collection. 若要加入至集合的項目數，方法，您可以建立項目的陣列，並將它傳遞給方法。To add a number of items to the collection, you create an array of items and pass it to the method. 如果您想要插入集合中的特定位置的項目，您可以使用方法。If you want to insert an item at a specific location in the collection, you can use the method. 若要移除的項目，您可以使用方法或方法，如果您知道項目位於集合中的何處。To remove items, you can use either the method or the method if you know where the item is located in the collection. 方法可讓您移除而不是使用集合中的所有項目方法以移除單一項目一次。The method enables you to remove all items from the collection instead of using the method to remove a single item at a time. 方法和屬性的加入和移除項目，除了也提供方法來尋找集合中的項目。In addition to methods and properties for adding and removing items, the also provides methods to find items in the collection. 方法可讓您判斷項目是否為集合的成員。The method enables you to determine whether an item is a member of the collection. 一旦您知道項目位於集合中，您可以使用方法，以判斷項目位於集合中的何處。Once you know that the item is located in the collection, you can use the method to determine where the item is located in the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將項目加入。The following code example demonstrates how to add items to a . 請注意，的屬性`ListView1`別的。Note that the property of `ListView1` is of type . 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到表單，其中包含名為物件`ListView1`並名為`TextBox1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a object named `ListView1` and a named `TextBox1`. 呼叫`InitializeListView`從表單的建構函式的方法或事件處理常式。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. summary.span: 建立具有指定之文字的項目，並將它加入集合中。

span.span: Creates an item with the specified text and adds it to the collection.
The that was added to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個版本的方法用來建立新加入控制項。You can use this version of the method to create a new to add to a control. 新的文字加入至控制項根據`text`參數。The text of the new added to the control is based on the `text` parameter. 如果您想要指定項目的映像，使用版本接受映像索引做為參數的方法。If you want to specify an image for the item, use the version of the method that accepts an image index as a parameter. 如果您有現有您想要加入至集合，請使用新版方法可接受做為其參數。If you have an existing that you want to add to the collection, use the version of the method that accepts a as its parameter. 如果以外的其他屬性設定為值或者屬性設定之後的項目新增, 排序清單。If the property is set to a value other than or if the property is set, the list is sorted after the item is added. 否則，在清單結尾處插入項目。Otherwise, the item is inserted at the end of the list. 如果未排序清單，您可以使用方法來插入項目特定位置。If the list is not sorted, you can use the method to insert an item into the at a specific position. 若要在單一作業中的控制項中加入一組項目，使用方法。To add a set of items to the control in a single operation, use the method. 如果您想要使用方法加入至控制項的項目數量龐大，請使用並方法，以避免從重新繪製，除非新增所有項目。If you want to use the method to add a large number of items to the control, use the and methods to prevent the from repainting until all items are added. 新增項目時，它會先排序的項目，然後再新增新的項目更有效率。When adding items to a , it is more efficient to sort the items first and then add new items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個版本的方法，以加入現有至集合。You can use this version of the method to add an existing to the collection. 本版方法通常用來重複使用從其他的項目控制項或手動建立再將它新增至集合。This version of the method is typically used to reuse items from other controls or if the was created manually before adding it to the collection. 如果您想要建立新而不是使用現有的項目，使用 其他版本的方法。If you want to create a new instead of using an existing item, use the other versions of the method. 如果以外的其他屬性設定為值或者屬性設定之後的項目新增, 排序清單。If the property is set to a value other than or if the property is set, the list is sorted after the item is added. 否則，在清單結尾處插入項目。Otherwise, the item is inserted at the end of the list. 如果未排序清單，您可以使用方法來插入項目特定位置。If the list is not sorted, you can use the method to insert an item into the at a specific position. 若要在單一作業中的控制項中加入一組項目，使用方法。To add a set of items to the control in a single operation, use the method. 如果您想要使用方法加入至控制項的項目數量龐大，請使用並方法，以避免從重新繪製，除非新增所有項目。If you want to use the method to add a large number of items to the control, use the and methods to prevent the from repainting until all items are added. 新增項目時，它會先排序的項目，然後再新增新的項目更有效率。When adding items to a , it is more efficient to sort the items first and then add new items. 本版方法也會用來指派至。This version of the method is also used to assign a to a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個版本的方法用來建立新加入控制項。You can use this version of the method to create a new to add to the control. 新的文字加入至控制項根據`text`參數。The text of the new added to the control is based on the `text` parameter. 您也可以藉由傳遞的索引來指定項目的映像指派給並屬性，以`imageIndex`參數。You can also specify an image for the item by passing the index of the assigned to the and properties to the `imageIndex` parameter. (通常和屬性以顯示相關的映像使用相同的索引位置。)如果不想指定項目的影像索引，使用版本接受字串做為參數的方法。(Typically, the and properties use the same index positions to display related images.) If you do not want to specify an image index for the item, use the version of the method that accepts only a string as a parameter. 如果您有現有您想要加入至集合，請使用新版方法可接受做為其參數。If you have an existing that you want to add to the collection, use the version of the method that accepts a as its parameter. 如果以外的其他屬性設定為值或者屬性設定之後的項目新增, 排序清單。If the property is set to a value other than or if the property is set, the list is sorted after the item is added. 否則，在清單結尾處插入項目。Otherwise, the item is inserted at the end of the list. 如果未排序清單，您可以使用方法來插入項目特定位置。If the list is not sorted, you can use the method to insert an item into the at a specific position. 若要在單一作業中的控制項中加入一組項目，使用方法。To add a set of items to the control in a single operation, use the method. 如果您想要使用方法加入至控制項的項目數量龐大，請使用並方法，以避免從重新繪製，除非新增所有項目。If you want to use the method to add a large number of items to the control, use the and methods to prevent the from repainting until all items are added. 新增項目時，它會先排序的項目，然後再新增新的項目更有效率。When adding items to a , it is more efficient to sort the items first and then add new items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法來重複使用來自不同的項目控制項。You can use this method to reuse items from a different control. 如果您想要新增單一，使用方法。If you want to add a single , use the method. 您也可以使用方法，如果您想要新增單一集合中的特定位置。You can also use the method if you want to add a single at a specific position in the collection. 您也可以使用這個方法將多個物件至。You can also use this method to assign multiple objects to a . 如果以外的其他屬性設定為值或者屬性設定之後的項目會加入, 排序清單。If the property is set to a value other than or if the property is set, the list is sorted after the items are added. 否則，項目會插入清單的結尾。Otherwise, the items are inserted at the end of the list. 如果未排序清單，您可以使用方法來插入項目插入特定的位置。If the list is not sorted, you can use the method to insert items into the at specific positions. ## Examples 下列範例會建立有三個控制項指定的物件和三個每個項目所指定的物件。The following example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此範例也會建立物件詳細資料檢視中顯示的子項目。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 兩個物件也會建立在程式碼範例中提供的映像物件。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 這些物件加入至和屬性。These objects are added to the and properties. 此範例會使用下列屬性建立控制項：The example uses the following properties in creating the control: - - - - - - - 這個範例需要您加入的程式碼並呼叫在範例中，從建構函式或在表單上的另一種方法建立的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and called the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 這個範例也會需要映像名為`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位於 c 磁碟機的根目錄The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. [!code-cpp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]
